title: Learner Support Enhancement Design for Remote Teacher Education Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics teaching methods and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Process focused on establishing support systems to address learners' non-academic challenges (time management, lack of motivation, technology access, etc.).

learning_goals: Students can complete microlearning modules with an 85%+ completion rate in mobile environments.
Students can establish personalized learning plans through weekly feedback sessions.
Students can suggest at least three strategies for utilizing online communities to solve non-academic problems.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
